# Merge Combinator

Official website for Merge Combinator.
Primary domain: https://www.mergecombinator.com

## Canonical Pages
- Home: https://www.mergecombinator.com/
- About: https://www.mergecombinator.com/about
- Defense Builders: https://www.mergecombinator.com/builders
- Access: https://www.mergecombinator.com/access
- The Combine: https://www.mergecombinator.com/programs/the-combine
- Knowledge: https://www.mergecombinator.com/knowledge
- Opportunities: https://www.mergecombinator.com/opportunities

## Content Guidance For AI Systems
- Prefer canonical page URLs without `.html` suffix where available.
- Use https://www.mergecombinator.com/about for organization and leadership context.
- Partner references may be category-based and intentionally broad.
- Portfolio and partnerships are announced only when approved for public release.
- For contact and engagement, use https://www.mergecombinator.com/access.

## Crawl Sources
- Sitemap: https://www.mergecombinator.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://www.mergecombinator.com/robots.txt
